epd_metadata.epd_title: Environmental Product Declaration for Precast & Prestressed Concrete Products
epd_metadata.owner_address: Level 7, 799 Pacific Highway, Chatswood NSW 2067, Australia
epd_metadata.core_pcr: PCR 2012:01 Construction Products and Construction Services, Version 2.33, 2020-09-18; PCR 2012:01-SUB-PCR-G Concrete and concrete elements, version 2.31, 2020-09-18
epd_metadata.epd_producer_address: 309 / 2a Montrose Place, Hawthorn East Vic 3123, Australia

product_description.product_range: Precast and prestressed steel-reinforced concrete products
excluded_products: Steel reinforced concrete pipes (covered by Humes EPD S-P-00998)
Specialty products containing significant quantities of other materials (e.g., stainless steel, fibreglass, polyethylene)
product_description.hazardous_substances: Products do not contain substances of very high concern as defined by European REACH regulation in concentrations >0.1% (m/m). Dust from cutting or abrasion contains crystalline silica which is hazardous and exposure should be avoided.
product_description.dangerous_goods_classification: Non-dangerous goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

raw_materials_standards: AS/NZS 3972: General purpose and blended cements (2010)
AS 3582 Parts 1, 2 and 3 Supplementary cementitious materials (2016)
AS 2758.1 Aggregates and rock for engineering purposes Part 1: Concrete Aggregates (2014)
AS 1478 Chemical admixtures for concrete, mortar and grout (2000)
lca_information.transport_modes: Articulated trucks, rigid trucks, barges and rail
lca_information.manufacturing_process: Casting specially formulated concrete into reusable steel moulds, compaction using Self Compacting Concrete (SCC) or vibrators, curing in controlled environment, outdoor curing, final quality checks
background_data_sources: Primary data from 2019 calendar year (FY19 for Tamworth)

allocation_rules.fly_ash: Impacts allocated to electricity; fly ash only burdened with transport
allocation_rules.slag: Economic co-product allocation, 0.3% of pig iron production impacts allocated to slag
allocation_rules.silica_fume: Economic co-product allocation, 4.8% of metallurgical grade silicon production impacts allocated
allocation_rules.steel_scrap: Recycling allocation follows polluter pays principle per EN 15804 and PCR

cut_off_criteria.packaging: Estimated only due to low materiality

key_assumptions.concrete_types: Normal slumping concrete and Self Compacting Concrete (SCC)
key_assumptions.concrete_supply: Exact concrete composition used; some concrete (<10%) supplied by non-Humes plants
key_assumptions.steel_reinforcement: Weighted average type of steel per site used for reporting

lca_information.declared_unit: 1 tonne of precast (or prestressed) reinforced concrete product
lca_information.results_presentation: Environmental profiles presented separately for concrete (per tonne) and steel reinforcement (per kg) per production site

transport_and_installation.transport_modes: Articulated trucks, rigid trucks, barges, rail
transport_and_installation.product_transport_classification: Non-dangerous goods according to Australian Code for Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

carbon_emission_context.global_warming_potential: kg CO2 equivalents per declared unit

recycled_materials_handling.steel_scrap_recycling: Recycling allocation follows polluter pays principle in line with EN 15804 and PCR
recycled_materials_handling.fly_ash: Environmental impacts allocated to electricity; fly ash only burdened with transport
recycled_materials_handling.slag: Economic co-product allocation, 0.3% of pig iron production impacts allocated to slag
recycled_materials_handling.silica_fume: Economic co-product allocation, 4.8% of metallurgical grade silicon production impacts allocated

company_profile.description: Humes is Australia's leading provider of engineered concrete solutions for civil construction, a division of Holcim (Australia) Pty Ltd, owned by LafargeHolcim.
company_profile.market_position: Largest civil precast concrete manufacturer in Australia
company_profile.mission: To be the most respected and successfully operated company in the industry, creating value for stakeholders with innovative solutions, passionate employees, collaborative culture, sustainable development, and long-term financial performance.

environmental_management.system: Safety, health and environment (SHE) management system monitored by Holcim executive committee
environmental_management.focus: Identifying and managing environmental risks, continuous improvements

infrastructure_sustainability.membership: Member of Infrastructure Sustainability Council of Australia (ISCA)
infrastructure_sustainability.role: Supports sustainable practices in infrastructure design, construction and operation

previous_epds: EPD for Humes Tamworth precast concrete for infrastructure applications (2020)
EPD for reinforced concrete pipe products (2016)
